items.sentence: I know Tom has enough money to buy what he wants.
I know Tom will sing that song if you request it.
Why don\'t you just say you don\'t want to do it?
There are lots of other things we could be doing.
I\'ve got to find something to do after I retire.
I\'ve just told you everything I know about that.
I\'ve heard that you\'re good at speaking French.
I\'ve heard that you\'re planning to retire soon.
Unfortunately, I wasn\'t able to keep my promise.
Tom had no way of knowing when Mary would arrive.
